target.name: Sect2
target.text: Edit Default Team Workspace Access Rights

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Create the Team Creator Group:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the ICEcore Administration portlet, click Manage Groups.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the ICEcore Administration portlet, click Manage Groups.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Manage Groups window, click Add a New Group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter the new group's name, title, description, and then click Add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Select a Group to Modify or Delete, click the Team Creator (Team Creator) group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add users to the group and click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Grant the Team Creator Group Sole Team Workspace Creation Rights:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Access Control.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add a Group in the Access Rights table.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start typing Team Creator in the Add a Group dialog that appears and select Team Creator from the drop-down list that appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Deselect the Workspace Creator option for the All Users group and select the same right for the Team Creator group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Save Changes.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Create Your Initial Workspaces

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Creating Teams

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Create an Administration Team Workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From your Home Page, click Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: From your Home Page, click Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add a Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in a tile for the new workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the team members.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select all the initial Workspace Folders you want to create in this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Set the Administration Team Access Rights

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the ICEcore Administration Team workspace, click Access Control.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the ICEcore Administration Team workspace, click Access Control.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Access Rights table, click Add a Group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start typing in admin, and select admin from the drop-down list that appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: For the admin group, select the Workspace and Folder Administrator, Participant, and Team Member roles.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Save Changes.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Set Up E-mail for a Workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From your workspace, select the top level folder for which you want to enable e-mail.

target.name: Step
target.text: From your workspace, select the top level folder for which you want to enable e-mail.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Manage This Folder and select the Email Settings menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the e-mail alias you received from your e-mail administrator in the Receiving Email From field.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the e-mail Notification Schedule and add the users, groups, and any individual e-mail addresses you want to receive e-mail notifications, and then click Apply.
